Name: Maria Jose
description:
María is 34 years old. She studied until the ninth grade in school. She's married, her husband is a mechanic and she has two children who depend on her. She lives with her husband and children.
María is dedicated to growing and selling plantains. She has various years of experience in this work. She learned it from her father. To sell her plantains she has to travel 5 kilometers and she does so on bus. She works five hours every day. She needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies such as mulch and fertilizer for her plantain plants.
María dreams of improving her sales and of being the biggest distributor in her municipality and of improving the quality of her life and of her family.
